This is particularly useful for populating your database with sample data during development and testing.</p><hr data-start="301" data-end="304"><h3 data-start="306" data-end="335"><strong data-start="310" data-end="335">Key Uses of Factories</strong></h3><ol data-start="336" data-end="569"><li data-start="336" data-end="409"><strong data-start="339" data-end="359">Database Seeding</strong>: Populate your database with realistic test data.</li><li data-start="410" data-end="482"><strong data-start="413" data-end="424">Testing</strong>: Generate fake data for your unit tests or feature tests.</li><li data-start="483" data-end="569"><strong data-start="486" data-end="511">Efficient Development</strong>: Save time by quickly creating data without manual input.</li></ol><hr data-start="571" data-end="574"><h3 data-start="576" data-end="615"><strong data-start="580" data-end="615">How to Create and Use a Factory</strong></h3><h4 data-start="617" data-end="645"><strong data-start="622" data-end="645">1. data-end="61">Here's how you can proceed with the project setup and design:</p><hr data-start="63" data-end="66"><h3 data-start="68" data-end="112"><strong data-start="72" data-end="112">1. Here are some options:</p><h4 data-start="248" data-end="281"><strong data-start="253" data-end="281">Option A: Laravel Breeze</strong></h4><ul data-start="282" data-end="584"><li data-start="282" data-end="482"><strong data-start="284" data-end="292">Pros</strong>:<ul data-start="296" data-end="482"><li data-start="296" data-end="332">Lightweight and beginner-friendly.</li><li data-start="335" data-end="421">Includes basic authentication features like login, registration, and password reset.</li><li data-start="424" data-end="482">Uses <strong data-start="431" data-end="450">Blade templates</strong>, which are simple to customize.</li></ul></li><li data-start="483" data-end="584"><strong data-start="485" data-end="500">When to Use</strong>: If you want a simple, quick start and plan to handle most customizations yourself.</li></ul><h4 data-start="586" data-end="622"><strong data-start="591" data-end="622">Option B: Laravel Jetstream</strong></h4><ul data-start="623" data-end="900"><li data-start="623" data-end="811"><strong data-start="625" data-end="633">Pros</strong>:<ul data-start="637" data-end="811"><li data-start="637" data-end="665">More advanced than Breeze.</li><li data-start="668" data-end="714">Includes <strong data-start="679" data-end="704">teams and permissions</strong> features.</li><li data-start="717" data-end="811">Supports both <strong data-start="733" data-end="745">Livewire</strong> (Blade + real-time components) and <strong data-start="781" data-end="795">Inertia.js</strong> (Vue or React).</li></ul></li><li data-start="812" data-end="900"><strong data-start="814" data-end="829">When to Use</strong>: If you want a more feature-rich authentication system out of the box.</li></ul><h4 data-start="902" data-end="926"><strong data-start="907" data-end="925">Recommendation</strong>:</h4><p data-start="927" data-end="1172">For your project, <strong data-start="945" data-end="963">Laravel Breeze</strong> is the better starting point because it's lightweight and easier to extend for specific roles like users, agents, and property owners. If you later need more complex features, you can integrate them manually.</p><hr data-start="1174" data-end="1177"><h3 data-start="1179" data-end="1209"><strong data-start="1183" data-end="1209">2. Here's how to approach it:</p><h4 data-start="1294" data-end="1321"><strong data-start="1299" data-end="1321">Frontend Framework</strong></h4><ul data-start="1322" data-end="1564"><li data-start="1322" data-end="1564">Use <strong data-start="1328" data-end="1344">Tailwind CSS</strong> or <strong data-start="1348" data-end="1361">Bootstrap</strong> to ensure your site is responsive and visually appealing.<ul data-start="1422" data-end="1564"><li data-start="1422" data-end="1493"><strong data-start="1424" data-end="1440">Tailwind CSS</strong>: More flexible and modern, great for custom designs.</li><li data-start="1496" data-end="1564"><strong data-start="1498" data-end="1511">Bootstrap</strong>: Easier for beginners, with pre-designed components.</li></ul></li></ul><h4 data-end="1905"><p data-start="1764" data-end="1784"><strong data-start="1764" data-end="1783">Interactive Map</strong>:</p><ul data-start="1788" data-end="1905"><li data-start="1788" map dynamically.</li></ul></li><li data-start="1907" data-end="2016"><p data-start="1910" data-end="1925"><strong data-start="1910" data-end="1924">Navigation</strong>:</p><ul data-start="1929" data-start="2929" data-end="2947">Person 1 (You)</strong>:</h4><ol data-start="2949" data-end="3224"><li data-start="2949" data-end="3116">Set up the Laravel backend:<ul data-start="2983" data-end="3116"><li data-start="2983" data-end="3000">Install Breeze.</li><li data-start="3004" data-end="3062">Create migrations for users, properties, inquiries, etc.</li><li data-start="3066" desktop and mobile.</li></ul></li><li data-start="3438" data-end="3577">Work on UI/UX mockups in Figma:<ul data-start="3476" data-end="3577"><li data-start="3476" data-end="3514">Share designs with use App\Http\Controllers\ProfileController;
use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Route;
use App\Http\Controllers\SearchController;
use App\Http\Controllers\PageController;
use App\Http\Controllers\Auth\LoginController;
use App\Http\Controllers\Auth\RegisterController;
use App\Http\Controllers\PropertyController;
use App\Http\Controllers\InquiryController;
use App\Http\Controllers\AppointmentController;
use App\Http\Controllers\AdminController;
use App\Http\Controllers\AdminPropertyController;

// Admin routes
Route::middleware(['auth', 'admin'])-&gt;group(function () {
    Route::get('/admin', [AdminController::class, 'index'])-&gt;name('admin.dashboard');
    Route::resource('admin/properties', AdminPropertyController::class);
});

// Property routes
Route::prefix('properties')-&gt;name('properties.')-&gt;group(function () {
    Route::get('/buy', [PropertyController::class, 'buy'])-&gt;name('buy');
    Route::get('/rent', [PropertyController::class, 'rent'])-&gt;name('rent');
    Route::get('/sell', [PropertyController::class, 'sell'])-&gt;name('sell');
    Route::resource('/', PropertyController::class)-&gt;except(['index', 'create', 'store']);
});

// Inquiry and Appointment routes
Route::resource('inquiries', InquiryController::class);
Route::resource('appointments', AppointmentController::class);

// Public page routes
Route::get('/', [PageController::class, 'home'])-&gt;name('home');
Route::get('/about', [PageController::class, 'about'])-&gt;name('about');
Route::get('/properties', [PageController::class, 'properties'])-&gt;name('properties');
Route::get('/contact', [PageController::class, 'contact'])-&gt;name('contact');

// Authentication routes
Route::controller(LoginController::class)-&gt;group(function () {
    Route::get('/login', 'showLoginForm')-&gt;name('login');
    Route::post('/login', 'login');
    Route::post('/logout', 'logout')-&gt;name('logout');
});

Route::controller(RegisterController::class)-&gt;group(function () {
    Route::get('/register', 'showRegistrationForm')-&gt;name('register');
    Route::post('/register', 'register');
});

// Authenticated routes
Route::middleware('auth')-&gt;group(function () {
    Route::get('/dashboard', function () {
        return view('dashboard');
    })-&gt;middleware(['verified'])-&gt;name('dashboard');

    Route::prefix('profile')-&gt;name('profile.')-&gt;group(function () {
        Route::get('/', [ProfileController::class, 'edit'])-&gt;name('edit');
        Route::patch('/', [ProfileController::class, 'update'])-&gt;name('update');
        Route::delete('/', [ProfileController::class, 'destroy'])-&gt;name('destroy');
    });

    Route::get('/search', [SearchController::class, 'index'])-&gt;name('search');
});

require __DIR__.'/auth.php';

&lt;?php

use App\Http\Controllers\Auth\AuthenticatedSessionController;
use App\Http\Controllers\Auth\ConfirmablePasswordController;
use App\Http\Controllers\Auth\EmailVerificationNotificationController;
use App\Http\Controllers\Auth\EmailVerificationPromptController;
use App\Http\Controllers\Auth\NewPasswordController;
use App\Http\Controllers\Auth\PasswordController;
use App\Http\Controllers\Auth\PasswordResetLinkController;
use App\Http\Controllers\Auth\RegisteredUserController;
use App\Http\Controllers\Auth\VerifyEmailController;
use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Route;


use App\Http\Controllers\UserController;
use App\Http\Controllers\AgentController;
use App\Http\Controllers\OwnerController;

// Dashboard routes based on roles
Route::middleware(['auth', 'role:user'])-&gt;group(function () {
    Route::get('/user/dashboard', [UserController::class, 'dashboard'])-&gt;name('user.dashboard');
});

Route::middleware(['auth', 'role:agent'])-&gt;group(function () {
    Route::get('/agent/dashboard', [AgentController::class, 'dashboard'])-&gt;name('agent.dashboard');
});

Route::middleware(['auth', 'role:owner'])-&gt;group(function () {
    Route::get('/owner/dashboard', [OwnerController::class, 'dashboard'])-&gt;name('owner.dashboard');
});


Route::middleware('guest')-&gt;group(function () {
    Route::get('register', [RegisteredUserController::class, 'create'])
        -&gt;name('register');

    Route::post('register', [RegisteredUserController::class, 'store']);

    Route::get('login', [AuthenticatedSessionController::class, 'create'])
        -&gt;name('login');

    Route::post('login', [AuthenticatedSessionController::class, 'store']);

    Route::get('forgot-password', [PasswordResetLinkController::class, 'create'])
        -&gt;name('password.request');

    Route::post('forgot-password', [PasswordResetLinkController::class, 'store'])
        -&gt;name('password.email');

    Route::get('reset-password/{token}', [NewPasswordController::class, 'create'])
        -&gt;name('password.reset');

    Route::post('reset-password', [NewPasswordController::class, 'store'])
        -&gt;name('password.store');
});

Route::middleware('auth')-&gt;group(function () {
    Route::get('verify-email', EmailVerificationPromptController::class)
        -&gt;name('verification.notice');

    Route::get('verify-email/{id}/{hash}', VerifyEmailController::class)
        -&gt;middleware(['signed', 'throttle:6,1'])
        -&gt;name('verification.verify');

    Route::post('email/verification-notification', [EmailVerificationNotificationController::class, 'store'])
        -&gt;middleware('throttle:6,1')
        -&gt;name('verification.send');

    Route::get('confirm-password', [ConfirmablePasswordController::class, 'show'])
        -&gt;name('password.confirm');

    Route::post('confirm-password', [ConfirmablePasswordController::class, 'store']);

    Route::put('password', [PasswordController::class, 'update'])-&gt;name('password.update');

    Route::post('logout', [AuthenticatedSessionController::class, 'destroy'])
        -&gt;name('logout');
});

    &lt;script&gt;
        function showRatingForm(agentid) {
            document.getElementById("ratingForm-"+agentid).classList.remove("hidden");
        }
    
        function setRating(agentid,rating) {
            selectedRating = rating;
            document.getElementById("ratingValue-"+agentid).value = rating;
            let stars = document.querySelectorAll("#starContainer-"+agentid+" span");
            stars.forEach((star, index) =&gt; {
                star.style.color = index &lt; rating ? "gold" : "gray";
            });
        }
    
        function cancelProcess(agentid) {
            document.getElementById("ratingForm-"+agentid).classList.add("hidden");
        }
    &lt;/script&gt;

        &lt;div class="container mx-auto px-4 py-8"&gt;
            &lt;!-- Flex container to display cards side by side --&gt;
            &lt;div class="flex flex-wrap justify-center gap-8"&gt;
                @foreach ($agents as $agent)
                    &lt;div class="group bg-white rounded-lg shadow-lg overflow-hidden h-full "&gt;
                        &lt;img src="{{asset('../images/profiles/' . $agent-&gt;profile_picture)}}" alt="Agent"
                            class="w-full h-48 object-cover"&gt;
                        &lt;div class="p-6"&gt;
                            &lt;h3 class="text-xl font-semibold mb-1"&gt;
                            {{$agent-&gt;name}}
                            &lt;/h3&gt;
                            &lt;span class="block text-gray-500 mb-4"&gt;Real Estate Agent&lt;/span&gt;
                            &lt;p&gt;Average rating: {{number_format($agent-&gt;reviews-&gt;avg('review'), 2)}}&lt;/p&gt;
                            &lt;a href="{{route('show.agent')}}" class="underline text-blue-600"&gt;view agent&lt;/a&gt;
                            &lt;button onclick="showRatingForm({{$agent-&gt;id}})"
                                class="ml-4 text-white bg-blue-600 px-3 py-1 rounded hover:bg-blue-700 transition"&gt;
                                Rate
                            &lt;/button&gt;
                            &lt;ul class="flex space-x-4"&gt;
                                &lt;li&gt;&lt;a href="#" class="text-gray-400 hover:text-blue-600 transition"&gt;&lt;i class="fab fa-twitter text-xl"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
                                &lt;li&gt;&lt;a href="#" class="text-gray-400 hover:text-blue-600 transition"&gt;&lt;i class="fab fa-facebook-f text-xl"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
                                &lt;li&gt;&lt;a href="#" class="text-gray-400 hover:text-blue-600 transition"&gt;&lt;i class="fab fa-linkedin-in text-xl"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
                                &lt;li&gt;&lt;a href="#" class="text-gray-400 hover:text-blue-600 transition"&gt;&lt;i class="fab fa-instagram text-xl"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
                            &lt;/ul&gt;
                        &lt;/div&gt;
                    &lt;/div&gt;
                    &lt;!-- Rating Form (Hidden Initially) --&gt;
                    &lt;div id="ratingForm-{{$agent-&gt;id}}"
                        class="hidden fixed inset-0 flex items-center justify-center bg-black bg-opacity-50"&gt;
                        &lt;div class="bg-white p-6 rounded-lg shadow-lg w-80 text-center"&gt;
                            &lt;p class="text-lg font-semibold mb-4"&gt;Review agent&lt;/p&gt;
                            &lt;div class="flex justify-center mb-4" id="starContainer-{{$agent-&gt;id}}"&gt;
                                &lt;span class="text-2xl cursor-pointer" onclick="setRating({{$agent-&gt;id}},1)"&gt;&amp;#9733;&lt;/span&gt;
                                &lt;span class="text-2xl cursor-pointer" onclick="setRating({{$agent-&gt;id}},2)"&gt;&amp;#9733;&lt;/span&gt;
                                &lt;span class="text-2xl cursor-pointer" onclick="setRating({{$agent-&gt;id}},3)"&gt;&amp;#9733;&lt;/span&gt;
                                &lt;span class="text-2xl cursor-pointer" onclick="setRating({{$agent-&gt;id}},4)"&gt;&amp;#9733;&lt;/span&gt;
                                &lt;span class="text-2xl cursor-pointer" onclick="setRating({{$agent-&gt;id}},5)"&gt;&amp;#9733;&lt;/span&gt;
                            &lt;/div&gt;
                            &lt;form method="POST" action="{{route('review.agent', $agent-&gt;id)}}"&gt;
                                @csrf
                                &lt;input type="hidden" name="rating" id="ratingValue-{{$agent-&gt;id}}"&gt;
                                &lt;button type="submit"
                                    class="mt-4 px-4 py-2 bg-green-500 text-white rounded-lg hover:bg-green-600 transition"&gt;
                                    Confirm
                                &lt;/button&gt;
                            &lt;/form&gt;
                            &lt;button onclick="cancelProcess({{$agent-&gt;id}})"
                                class="mt-4 px-4 py-2 bg-red-500 text-white rounded-lg hover:bg-red-600 transition"&gt;
                                Cancel
                            &lt;/button&gt;
                        &lt;/div&gt;
                    &lt;/div&gt;
                @endforeach
            &lt;/div&gt;
        &lt;/div&gt;
        &lt;script&gt;
            function showRatingForm(agentid) {
                document.getElementById("ratingForm-"+agentid).classList.remove("hidden");
            }
        
            function setRating(agentid,rating) {
                selectedRating = rating;
                document.getElementById("ratingValue-"+agentid).value = rating;
                let stars = document.querySelectorAll("#starContainer-"+agentid+" span");
                stars.forEach((star, index) =&gt; {
                    star.style.color = index &lt; rating ? "gold" : "gray";
                });
            }
        
            function cancelProcess(agentid) {
                document.getElementById("ratingForm-"+agentid).classList.add("hidden");
            }
